summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.34.020 and 23.34.022 of the Seattle Municipal Code to implement a 2001 amendment to the City of Seattle's Comprehensive Plan to permit the Lowrise 3 (L3) and Lowrise 4 (L4) designations to be applied in the Delridge Neighborhood Revitalization Area for a mixed-income housing development initiated by a public agency or the Seattle Housing Authority.
